parameters.name: RuleAction
parameters.description:
Rule action, with values:

- **deny**: Block.

- **js**: JS Verification.

- **observe**: Observe.

parameters.name: RuleIds
parameters.description:
List of rule IDs to be operated on, separated by English commas (,).
> You can call the [DescribeHttpDDoSAttackRules](~~DescribeHttpDDoSAttackRules~~) API to get this parameter.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: Site ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~2850189~~) API.
